sentences.en: An improved algorithm of fast correlation attack on stream cipher is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出一种针对序列密码的改进的快速相关攻击算法.

sentences.en: At last they managed to puzzle out the meaning of the cipher.
sentences.cn: 最后他们终于弄清楚这符号是什么意思.

sentences.en: He was little more than a cipher who faithfully carried out the Fuehrer's commands.
sentences.cn: 他只不过是个走狗，忠实执行元首的命令。

sentences.en: He's a mere cipher in the company.
sentences.cn: 他在公司里是个无足轻重的小人物.

sentences.en: However, block cipher algorithms tend to execute more slowly than stream ciphers.
sentences.cn: 但是, 块密码算法执行起来通常比流密码慢.

sentences.en: I couldn't cipher out his motives.
I will not write down his real name even in this bothersome Yiddish - letter cipher.
sentences.cn: 即使是用难以辨认的意弟绪语字母的密码,我也不愿意在这里写下他的真实姓名.

sentences.en: Rijndael encryption algorithm is the grouping variable length block cipher.
sentences.cn: Rijndael加密算法 是分组长度可变的分组密码.

sentences.en: The British were constantly increasing their cipher security.
sentences.cn: 英国人不断地加强密码的保密措施.

sentences.en: The cipher took me three weeks before I hit it.
sentences.cn: 我费了3个多星期才把这密码解释出来。

sentences.en: The Foreign Office have been pushing us for months to get something on the cipher.
sentences.cn: 好几个月来,外交部一直在催我们要从密码中了解到一些情况.

sentences.en: The nature of the cipher is a fascinating theoretical question.
sentences.cn: 表音密码的性质是个令人着迷的理论性问题.

sentences.en: To write ( a message, for example ) in code or cipher.
sentences.cn: 译成密码用电码或密码书写 ( 如, 信息 )

words.tran_cn: 计算；做算术；将…译成密码

trans.tran_cn: 密码，零，不重要的人，无价值的东西
